name: John Was Sleeping!
description:
I made "John Was Sleeping!" for the MiniJam88.

The concept of the jam was Rush - No Text used, so this is a game about diffusing bombs and the story of John.

Code & Idea : All by me

Art: 

-I made the bombs with Blender. All the other assets are not mine. 

-Music by https://www.bensound.com

-Voices by me and my friends

This version is not stable, is not working properly,

I will try to fix any issues in the next days.

I fixed most of the bugs and now it's  ready for it's players!

I enjoyed very much all the process although it was very exhausting!

Enjoy!!
